item.title: Barcelona Counsillors' Travel Expenses
item.description: Introduction Owing to the Open Data BCN project, Barcelona City Council provides several datasets which are almost ready for consumption with minimal pre-processing. Among them, the tables of travel expenses of members of the town council (excluding the mayor) by year contain information about cost, duration and destination of the travels of said members since 2019. 1 The information is organized in csv files with a record for each travel accounting id (Numero_de registre in the files) and expense category: travel proper (Despla√ßament), lodging (Allotjament) and other (Altres despeses).

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
